body: I love the artwork, I eagerly await the full English translation... although i don't why every cock in his art has excessive amounts of foreskin, but I am not in this for the cocks anyways... but I'm thinking clearly the author must be modelling the cocks after his own. I am just glad mine doesn't look like that thanks the social norms America - snip snip.
